TweaksGalore.TweakSectionDef.label: Resources
TweaksGalore.TweakSectionDef.description: This will only function against vanilla versions of the raid types, some modded raids use their own version and will bypass these tweaks.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Metal Doesn't Burn
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes flammability from Steel and Plasteel, setting gold and silver slightly above 0 so they can still 'melt'.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Mineable Components
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes compacted components from map generation.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Mineable Plasteel
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes compacted plasteel from map generation.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Old Component Names
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Back in my day we had industrial and spacer components! Now you can too!

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Pretty Precious Metals
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the beauty of gold and silver (the item, not as a material) from -4 to 4.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Stronger Steel
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Doubles the durability of steel as a material.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Stackable Chunks
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Allows stone chunks and slag to be stackable. Changing this mid-save WILL cause issues.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows stone chunks and slag to be stackable. Changing this mid-save WILL cause issues.
